eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A BLUE ALERT FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Camp; Cass; Ellis; Franklin; Hopkins; Marion; Morris; Rains, TX; AT 04:59 PM ON NOV 03, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:59 PM NOV 04, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: UPDATE: Blue Alert: Jacksonville, Texas Suspect is BOBBY DENNIS wanted for involvement in the serious injury of a law enforcement officer. DENNIS is a 64 year old black male, last seen wearing a black jacket, and all black clothing and may be driving a Gray 2000 G M C Sierra with Texas license plate T R W 3 9 1 9. Call Jacksonville Police Department with information. If seen call 9 1 1.
